name: dotcloud.js
body:
## dotcloud.js

dotcloud.js is a Javascript library which lets you interact with powerful backend services directly from the browser, in just a few lines of code. For example, here's how to store data on a database:


```
dotcloud.db.insert('todo', {
      description: 'Learn how to play foosball',
      priority: 'high'
});
```

Here's how to retrieve data back from the database:

```
dotcloud.db.find('todo',
{priority: 'high'}, function (data) { /* ... */ });
```


### Support or Contact

dotcloud.js is a work in progress, and we would love to get your feedback. Check out the documentation at http://js.dotcloud.com/doc.html or contact us labs+js@dotcloud.com.
tagline: Extend your Javascript Application with Powerful Cloud Services
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
